meta.description: Optimize the production of black and matcha milk tea to maximize profits given resource constraints.

params.name: milk_usage
params.description: Milk usage per bottle of each type of milk tea in grams

params.name: honey_usage
params.description: Honey usage per bottle of each type of milk tea in grams

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per bottle of each type of milk tea

vars.name: bottles
vars.description: Number of bottles produced for each type of milk tea

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling milk teas

constraints.name: milk_constraint
constraints.description: Total milk usage must not exceed available stock

constraints.name: honey_constraint
constraints.description: Total honey usage must not exceed available stock
